title: 10 Bulldogs with major opportunity this spring
text:
Show All Slides Start Slideshow Next Slideshow 1 of 12 (Photo: UGA Athletics: Cory A. Cole) 
Spring practice is approximately a month away at Georgia. The Bulldogs will hold 14 practices and the annual G-Day spring scrimmage and while itâ€™s often a chance for most fans to get their football fix, it can be a huge opportunity for the student-athletes on the field. Not a member? For a limited time, buy one month of Dawgs247 VIP, get two months FREE! 
Below, Dawgs247 examines 10 players who were on the roster in 2016 and, with a strong spring, can see their Bulldog careers take off. 
(What's next for the Bulldogs? Make sure you're in the loop -- take a few moments to sign up for our FREE Bulldogs Newsletter! )
